title: BHEL bags 1,600 MW thermal project order from NTPC
description: According to the statement, under International Competitive Bidding (ICB), Bharat Heavy Electricals Ltd (BHEL) has bagged an order from NTPC for setting up the 2x800 MW Singrauli Supercritical Thermal Power Plant (STPP) Stage-III on Engineering, Procurement & Construction (EPC) basis.
